question_text: A data center technician is planning maintenance on a serverâ€™s power system. Which TWO steps are essential when servicing redundant hot-swappable power supplies? (Select two)
answer_options: Remove both supplies simultaneously to avoid imbalance
Ensure remaining supply is functioning before removal
Shut down the server to avoid electrical hazards
Replace one power unit at a time
correct_answer: Ensure remaining supply is functioning before removal
Replace one power unit at a time
explanation: Redundant systems must maintain full power during maintenance. Confirm the active unit is operational before replacing the other. Replacing both at once risks system shutdown.
